import React , {useEffect}from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import "../addEmployee/addEmp.css" const UpdateEmp = () => { const Users = { Name: "", Email: "", Mobile: "", Designation:"", Gender:"", Course:"", Photo:"" } const [data, setData] = useState(Users); const Navigate = useNavigate() const {id} = useParams(); const handleChange = (e) => { const {name,value}=e.target; setData({ ...data, [name]: value }); console.log(data) }; useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/api/getone/${id}`) .then((response)=>{ setData(response) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) },[id]) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios.put(`hhttp://localhost:8080/api/update/${id}`) .then((response)=>{ Navigate("/") }).catch((err)=>console.log(err)) }; return (

Edit Employee

Male Female
MCA BCA BSC
) } export default UpdateEmp;
